name: Bean Quest
description:
The misadventures of Beans, a strange puppy, Betty, a sentient pumpkin, Eunice, a dog with a woman's face, and Brahms, a rooster.

I made this game over the course of a few months. This was mostly just me learning RPG Maker and getting a feel for the software. It's random, experimental, and probably won't make a lot of sense. For the most part I just made up the story as I went, so there may be some inconsistencies here and there. 

I used the built-in tilesets, music, sound effects, parallaxes, and some character sprites and portraits, but for the main characters, some NPCs, all the enemies, and some parallaxes, pictures, and character portraits, I used  custom images (including my own artwork, stock photos, and photo bashed images)
